name: Mystery Trackers: The Fall of Iron RockCollector's Edition
name_original: Mystery Trackers: The Fall of Iron RockCollector's Edition
description:
Mystery Trackers: The Fall of Iron RockCollector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Elephant Games. It came out on 18-04-2018. It was published by Big Fish Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Mystery Trackers: The Fall of Iron RockCollector's Edition on PC.
